snippet: When Gary Shouldis moved last year, he typed up a list of items that were packed in each box and created a QR code on a sticker for each one.
abstract: When Gary Shouldis moved last year, he typed up a list of items that were packed in each box and created a QR code on a sticker for each one.
lead_paragraph: In my Dashboard post this morning, This Week in Small Business, I quoted Gary Shouldis, a consultant, talking about ways to use QR codes. Then I followed up with a few more questions:

headline.main: Drilling Down: Ways to Use QR Codes
